garden.heroAlt: Garden Room Sanctuary with private rooftop garden and Assisi views
garden.title: Your Private Rooftop Garden Sanctuary
garden.subtitle: Perfect for couples seeking authentic Assisi romance
garden.description: Step into your private sanctuary above medieval Assisi's rooftops. As dawn breaks over the Subasio mountains, enjoy morning espresso surrounded by aromatic herbs in your exclusive rooftop garden. The gentle chime of Santa Chiara's bells - just 30 meters away - creates the perfect soundtrack for your authentic Umbrian experience.
amenities: Wake up to church bells (30m from Basilica)
Private garden oasis in city center

terrace.heroAlt: Panoramic Terrace Apartment with valley views
terrace.title: Your Private Sunset Sanctuary
terrace.subtitle: Experience Assisi's most breathtaking sunsets from your private panoramic terrace
terrace.description: Experience Assisi's most breathtaking sunsets from your private panoramic terrace. This romantic apartment features a full kitchen for intimate dinners, an independent entrance for complete privacy, and unobstructed valley views that stretch to the horizon.
terrace.descriptionExtra: Located in the historic center just steps from Santa Chiara Basilica, you'll enjoy the perfect blend of authentic medieval atmosphere and modern luxury amenities. The apartment's elevated position provides a peaceful retreat while keeping you connected to Assisi's spiritual heart.

stoneVault.heroAlt: Historic Stone Vault Apartment with 13th century architecture
stoneVault.title: Your Medieval Living Experience
stoneVault.subtitle: Perfect for history lovers and families seeking authentic character
stoneVault.description: Step back in time within the authentic 13th century stone vaulted ceilings of this remarkable apartment. The historic architecture creates a unique atmosphere - cool in summer thanks to natural stone insulation, warm with character year-round. Modern comforts including a full kitchen, king bed, and queen sofa bed blend seamlessly with medieval charm. Experience Assisi as it was meant to be lived, surrounded by centuries of history while enjoying contemporary amenities.

modern.heroAlt: Contemporary Luxury Apartment with modern design and emotional lighting
modern.title: Your Contemporary Urban Retreat
modern.subtitle: Perfect for families and groups seeking modern comfort
modern.description: Experience the perfect blend of historic Assisi charm and contemporary luxury. Our recently renovated apartment features emotional lighting, a king-size bed plus queen sofa bed, and a full modern kitchen. The spacious bathroom with sophisticated lighting creates an ambiance of pure relaxation. Ideal for remote workers and families, this contemporary space offers all modern comforts while immersing you in Assisi's timeless atmosphere.
amenities: Full modern kitchen with all appliances

about.heroSubtitle: Where History Meets Hospitality in the Heart of Assisi

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Terrazza Santa Chiara was born from our deep love for Assisi's spiritual energy and architectural beauty. After years of traveling the world, we discovered this extraordinary property - the only accommodation just 30 meters from Santa Chiara Basilica.
story.paragraph2: We've carefully restored each room to honor its medieval heritage while adding the modern luxuries today's travelers deserve. Our mission is simple: help you experience authentic Assisi like a local, not a tourist.
